Travel

Coming in from out of town? Don't worry, we have everything you need to know about travel and where to stay!

BOS - LOGAN

View

Logan Airport (BOS) is based in East Boston and is one of America's busiest airports. Boston Airport serves the city, and the wider New England area, with domestic and international flights to destinations around the world. Logan will be the closest airport to both the hotels and festivites.

HOTELS

View

The Bride and Groom worked with two hotels to reserve discounted room blocks. Each hotel has rooms reserved for the nights of September 4th and 5th (guests have the option of staying for an extra night). Space is limited so be sure to reserve your room!

Hotels

The Hilton Logan Airport

$209 / night

View
**Ask for the "Admon-Brown Wedding room block" rate**

Hilton Faneuil Hall

$239 / night

View
**Put the code "BA0905" into the Group Code field when asked.**

***Reservations must be made by 8/14/2015.***
